## **Currículos** {.tabset}

<br>

```{r qualificacao}
# read separate sheets
data <-
  read_excel("Links.xlsx",
             sheet = "curriculo",
             col_types = c("text"))

for (i in 1:dim(data[1])) {
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat("### **", paste(data$Item[i], sep = ""), "**", "\n", sep = "")
  cat('<center>\n')
  if (!is.na(data$Item[i])) {
    cat(
      paste0(
        '<iframe src="',
        data$Link[i],
        '/preview" style="width:100%; height:600px; border:0;"></iframe>'
      )
    )
  } else {
    cat("<br>No data available<br>")
  }
  cat('\n</center>')
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat(paste(
    '<a style="float:right" href="#top"><b>Início',
    fa("circle-up"),
    '</b></a>'
  ))
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
}
```

## **Publicações e produção**

<br>

### **Artigos publicados em periódicos** {.tabset}

<br>

```{r artigos-em-periodicos}
# read separate sheets
data <-
  read_excel("Links.xlsx",
             sheet = "artigos-em-periodicos",
             col_types = c("text"))
table <- data

# síntese quantitativa
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat("#### **Síntese**", "\n", sep = "")

cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n</center>')
cat(paste(
  '<a style="float:right" href="#top"><b>Início',
  fa("circle-up"),
  '</b></a>'
))
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')

cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat("#### **Artigos**", "\n", sep = "")

# verifica se é open acess ou subscription
for (i in 1:dim(data)[1]) {
  # add OPEN ACESS badge
  tryCatch(
    expr = {
      my_doi_oa <-
        roadoi::oadoi_fetch(dois = data[i, 3], email = "cienciasdareabilitacao@souunisuam.com.br")
      if (my_doi_oa$is_oa) {
        # usa a imagem do OA e o link pelo DOI
        table[i, 3] <- 
          paste0(
            "<a style=\"display: inline-block; float: left; margin:0.0em 0.2em 0.0em 0.0em; padding:0.0em 0.2em 0.0em 0.0em;\" href=\"",
            data[i, 3],
            "\" target=\"_blank\">",
            "<img height=\"18px;\" src=\"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/25/Open_Access_logo_PLoS_white.svg/256px-Open_Access_logo_PLoS_white.svg.png\">",
            "</a>"
          )
      } else {
        # usa o link do DRIVE
        table[i, 3] <- paste0(
            "<a style=\"display: inline-block; float: left; margin:0.0em 0.2em 0.0em 0.0em; padding:0.0em 0.2em 0.0em 0.0em;\" href=\"",
            data[i, 2],
            "\" target=\"_blank\">Restrito",
            "</a>"
          )
      }
    },
    error = function(e) {
      
    }
  )
}

# drop link column
summ.table <- table [, -2]
colnames(summ.table) <- c("Produção", "Acesso")

# print table
print(
  kable(summ.table, align = c("l", rep(
    "c", ncol(summ.table) - 2
  ), "r"), escape = F) %>% kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"),
    full_width = T,
    position = "center"
  ) %>% scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "600px")
)
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n</center>')
cat(paste(
  '<a style="float:right" href="#top"><b>Início',
  fa("circle-up"),
  '</b></a>'
))
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
```
